no, a puppet show, i wonder
there was just one human amongst that puppet show.
although it was being frantically reputed, the girlstanding alone wasn't a doll; she had rich emotions.
the blood coming from my skewered limbs had completely stopped.
as expected of a wolf geist.
i wasn't the human here.
so, shion would suffer.
i was at fault for being a geist.
she would suffer because she had to choose between me and the dolls.
…because shion liked me.
because she had fallen for me.
because she didn't want me to die.
was i going to let shion be sad like this…!
i put strength into my hands and feet nailedby the wedges once more.
blood began pouringout again.

both my arms and legs.

name: hiroki
normalized: kuu….

now and when he had attacked us.
